title: How to make my original piano song more advanced - Quora

response.answer_text: You want to add a lower part on your left hand, somthing to give the song a base part and make it sound more full, it could just be a sort of chords that play in the background or you could write a whole melody, this will make the piece sound more advanced

Add repeating arpeggios and scales, add some chromatic notes, polyrhythms and add more dynamics and increase length. maybe add some counterpoints ( two melody running at the same time), huge chords huge jumps across the piano.
